mapper.insert: insert into wxaccount ( wxAccountName, wxAccountNo, wxType, description, state, createTime, cityId ) select #{wxAccountName}, #{wxAccountNo}, #{wxType}, #{description}, #{state}, sysdate(), #{cityId} from DUAL where #{wxAccountNo} not in (select wxAccountNo from wxaccount)

insert into gather_weixininfo ( weixin_name, weixin_no, openid, last_scan_date, update_num, create_date ) select #{wxAccountName}, #{wxAccountNo}, '', sysdate(), 0, sysdate() from DUAL where #{wxAccountNo} not in (select weixin_no from gather_weixininfo)
